Title: L'amore necessario
Writer: Fabio Carpi (screenplay), Fabio Carpi (story), Guillaume Chpaltine (screenplay)
Actors: Marie-Christine Barrault, Ben Kingsley, Ann-Gisel Glass, Malcolm Conrath
Plot: In the 19th century Europe, an aging scheming couple decides to manipulate and seduce a couple of young newlyweds in love, just for the fun of it.
